name: Dating Class [in dev]
description:
In your sophomore year of university, you decided to take a class on dating as a free elective, but also on the off-chance the class has something more in store for you… As you complete a group project to plan the perfect date, will you learn more about your good friend Felix or your grumpy classmate Jason?

  • ~7,000 words of content!
  • 2 love interests and routes!
  • 12 different ending combinations!

Felix's route is the most complete as of 4/14 with full sprites.

If you run into any bugs or if the game crashes, try pressing "Ignore" in the bottom panel.

All of the story content is in the game, but stay tuned for a post-game jam, more polished version of the game coming soon!

Director: Ally Duong

Artists: Gavin Arriaga (Felix) and Victoria Bruno (Backgrounds, Jason)

Writers: Ally Duong (Main Story, Felix, Jason), Gavin Arriaga (Jason), and Akie Kasai (Jason)

Programmer: Ally Duong
